title: Soup Plate, ca. 1750
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan
description: Straight marly with shaped edge, with underglaze blue line. Sprigs of flowers in underglaze blue in cavetto and on marly.

tombstone.epitaph:
Soup Plate, ca. 1750.
ca. 1750. Soft- paste porcelain, underglaze decoration. Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan. 1957-15-2.
